sect2.title: Installation of Pine
sect2.para: Install Pine by running the following commands:

screen.userinput: patch -Np1 -i ../pine-4.44-fhs.patch && ./build slx DEBUG='-Os ' MAILSPOOL='/var/mail' \ SSLDIR=/usr SSLCERTS=/etc/ssl/certs && cp doc/pine.1 /usr/share/man/man1 && cd bin && install pine /usr/bin
